d: Hugo is a hooded jumper with raglan sleeves.

s.cutPocket.d: The **Pocket** (4) is not shown, but you can trace it from the Front part (1), which has the pocket outline on it (not including seam allowance). The front part's cut-on-fold-and-grainline is also the pocket's cut-on-fold-and grainline.
s.cutCuff.d: The **Cuff** (9) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long, with the grainline parallel to the width.
s.cutHoodCenter.t: The hood center is not shown
s.cutHoodCenter.d: The **Hood center** (7) is a rectangular piece of main fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long, with the grainline parallel to the width.
s.cutNeckBinding.t: The neck binding is not shown
s.cutNeckBinding.d: The **Neck Binding** (10) is a rectangular piece of main fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long, with the grainline parallel to the length.
s.cutWaistband.d: The **Waistband** (8) is a rectangular piece of ribbing fabric {{{ w }}} wide and {{{ l }}} long, with the grainline parallel to the width.

ribbingHeight.d: Controls the height of the ribbing

ribbingStretch.d: Use this to adapt the pattern to how stretchy the ribbing that you are using is.

pocketWidth.d: Determined the width of the pocket.

hipsEase.d: The amount of ease at your hips.
